articles.content:
New Books off Press
   Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- New literary books have been recently published by the Literature and Art Publishing House of the DPRK.
 Among them are "Sun of All People", the third series of "Collection of True Stories through Visitor's Books of Kumsusan Memorial Palace" and "Only Heaven Knows", the fifth series of "Legendary on Bright Star of Mt. Paektu". The former conveys the boundless reverence of humankind for President Kim Il Sung and latter the stories of the love for the people shown by leader   Kim Jong Il on the long way of Songun inspection tour.    
 Two-part full-length novel "Born of Storm", medium-length novel "Blue Waterway" and classic novel "Queer Meeting by a Pair of Bracelets" (second part) were also brought out.
